title: When you flame your ally, but they don't play any better

replies.body:
But I told him to stop feeding!
Why doesn't he just magically stop feeding?
That's how it works right? He was only feeding because nobody told him to stop and now I did so he should stop.
See your problem is you didn't use any racial slurs. If you use a racial slur when you tell them to stop feeding, they *have* to play better right?

it can work, but to be sure you need to advise them to end their life.
/s

> [{quoted}](name=ScoundrelRuffian,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=X94OlwIV,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-08T01:25:52.414+0000)
>
> it can work, but to be sure you need to advise them to end their life.
> /s

I found that telling team mates to kill themselves is surprisingly ineffective. A possible explanation after doing some fact checks and evaluating my test results is that people who are about to kill themselves tend to focus less on the game while they are considering your advice and secluding themselves from life.

I find that the problem with this is, since they must do everything you say...
24 Minutes:*stops feeding*
26 Minutes: *an ally has disconnected*

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=X94OlwIV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-08T00:07:00.165+0000)
>
> See your problem is you didn't use any racial slurs. If you use a racial slur when you tell them to stop feeding, they *have* to play better right?

I studied this for a long time and trust me when I tell you that homophobic slurs and death threats yield slightly better results, about 9,32% more effective individually and 12,05% more effective when combined.
Combined with racial slurs you can increase this further to 12,67% but as you can clearly see there are some diminishing returns. The effects don't just stack additively.

I will admit one game a long time ago I was feeding horribly and my team went 30 minutes without flaming me and the tension was killing me. Suddenly one of them had and short tirade about how I was trash garbage etc, and that relieved the tension and I managed to come back and become relevant

Did someone say "stop feeding"...?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JjmzQEKoOps&t=18m17s

i don't understand. i demanded them to stop several times. i even ping spammed them. why is it not working? *checks list* make demands, check. ping spammed, check. i called them a noob. *checks it off*
I got banned for this XD
lol. you obviously did something wrong. did you ping then demand or demand then ping? cause i think there is a certain order you have to do it. i not sure though.
i pinged too much
ah.
https://i.imgur.com/qRItkZH.jpg[/img]
Did you try turning your ally on and off?
https://meme.xyz/uploads/posts/t/l-26436-disappointed-but-not-surprised.jpg
Can we sticky this in PB? Not even joking. It's practical advice that's also direct, concise, and engaging.
I try to coach bad players in game, but when u tell the adc to attack move they make that pikachu face...{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Then, as a good coach you should tell them to stop playing adcs and move to mages (Oriana, anivia, malzahar, Annie, etc) or supports.
hahahaha
lel
I don't get it, why the picture of Kennen?

he is going to be reworked

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
you flame your teammates because you know they will never do better*
Except.... that doesn't happen. Like ever. Not in one game.
you don't know me and that's probably why most people flame they see their teammates doing a lot of mistakes and they wont just stop derping like ever
Exactly. They dont stop being bad because you flamed them.

no they wont stop being bad cause they are so fundamentally bad it will take them years to change flaming people is just release of frustration that you have to babysit people who just got past tutorial
I flame my teammates and some play better. Thus this thread is false
They probably just muted you and refocused. Nothing to do with your flaming. Also 90% of the time you'll just break the focus they had left and then the game is lost 100%.
r/WOOOOSH
